Description
com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes
All classes, interfaces and enumerations that are related to scenes.
com.github.hanyaeger.core
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities
 
com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.delegates
 
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core.factories used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes
    Class
    Description
    EntityCollectionFactory
    A EntityCollectionFactory should be used to create instances of EntityCollection.
    PaneFactory
    A PaneFactory can be used to create instances of Pane or ScrollPane.
    SceneFactory
    A SceneFactory can be used to create instances of Scene.
    TileFactory
    The TileFactory should be used for creating instances of YaegerEntity that will be part of a TileMap.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core.factories used by com.github.hanyaeger.core
    Class
    Description
    SceneCollectionFactory
    A SceneCollectionFactory can be used to create instances of SceneCollection.

    A SceneFactory can be used to create instances of Scene.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core.factories used by com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities
    Class
    Description
    EntitySupplierFactory
    An EntitySupplierFactory is responsible for creating instances of EntitySupplier.
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core.factories used by com.github.hanyaeger.core.scenes.delegates
    Class
    Description
    BackgroundFactory
    A BackgroundFactory can be used to create instances of Background to be used as the background of a Pane.
    LineFactory
    An LineFactory should be used for creating instance of Line.
    TextFactory
    An LineFactory should be used for creating instance of Line.
